subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The German driver Nico Rosberg has intrigued fans and insiders with his late-season return to strength and domination of Lewis Hamilton, his Mercedes teammate, who has won the world title this year.
snippet: The German driver Nico Rosberg has intrigued fans and insiders with his late-season return to strength and domination of Lewis Hamilton, his Mercedes teammate, who has won the world title this year.
